text: Isaan dadhaboo turanis isaan boonaa turaniin “Lakkisaa; mala keessan kan halkaniifi guyyaatu; yeroo akka Rabbitti kafarruufi hiriyootaas akka Isaaf taasifnu nu ajajjan santu (badii keessa nu buuse).” jedhanHundi isaaniituu yeroo adabicha argan gaabbii (sheenaa) isaanii ni dhokfatanMorma warra kafaranii keessa dirii (sansalata) goonaSila waan dalagaa turan malee ni mindeeffamuu
